A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie itself is pretty bad; there are no memorable battles (even the prequels had some amazing battles)\, and the character interactions seem forced as heck.
The best line in the entire movie comes from a character they had to revive for only one scene and for nostalgia vibes.

It is just plainly bad\, it makes no sense to the original story\, but I still recommend to watch it; you'll enjoy it if you watch it with a funny perspective\, because how bad it is.
